# absence_dim
# Check for new, updated or deleted data
- This script checks for new, updated or deleted data by checking the source data view (vw_absences) against the target (odw_harmonised_db.absence_dim)
- **New Data:** where a PA in the source does not exist as an Work_Schedule_Rule in the target. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Updated data:** Comparison occurs on PA in source and Work_Schedule_Rule in target where the row hash is different i.e. there is a change in one of the columns. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Deleted data:** where an Work_Schedule_Rule in the target exists but the same PA doesn't exist in the source. DeletedData flag is set to 'Y'

## View absence_dim_new is created

%%sql
-- Build absence_dim table
-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW absence_dim_new

    AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT 
    CASE
        WHEN T1.Staff_Number IS NULL
        THEN T7.AbsenceID
        ELSE NULL
    END as AbsenceID, -- surrogate key
    T3.EmployeeID AS EmployeeID,
    Attendance_or_Absence_Type AS AbsenceType,
    Sickness_Group AS SicknessGroup,
    Start_Date AS AbsenceStartDate,
    End_Date AS AbsenceEndDate,
    T1.Days as Days,
    Cal_Days as CalendarDays,
    T4.WorkScheduleID as WorkScheduleID,
    Annual_Leave_Start AS AnnualLeaveStart,
    T2.SourceSystemID as SourceSystemID,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo,
    md5(concat(IFNULL(T3.EmployeeID,'.'), IFNULL(T1.Attendance_or_Absence_Type,'.'), IFNULL(T1.Start_Date,'.'), IFNULL(T1.End_Date,'.'))) as RowID,
    'Y' as IsActive,
    CASE
        WHEN T1.Attendance_or_Absence_Type = T7.AbsenceType AND 
                T1.Start_Date = T7.AbsenceStartDate AND 
                T1.End_Date = T7.AbsenceEndDate AND 
                md5(concat(IFNULL(T3.EmployeeID,'.'), IFNULL(T1.Attendance_or_Absence_Type,'.'), IFNULL(T1.Start_Date,'.'), IFNULL(T1.End_Date,'.'))) <> T7.RowID  -- same employee, changed data
        THEN 'Y'
        WHEN T7.EmployeeID IS NULL -- new employee
        THEN 'Y'
        ELSE 'N'
    END as NewData,
    CASE
        WHEN T3.EmployeeID IS NULL
        THEN 'Y'
        ELSE 'N'
    END AS  DeletedData, 
    T7.IsActive as HistoricIsActive

FROM odw_standardised_db.vw_absences T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description AND T2.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_employee_fact T3 ON T3.EmployeeNumber = T1.Staff_Number and T3.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_work_schedule_dim T4 ON T4.WorkScheduleRule = T1.Work_Schedule_Rule AND 
                                                        T4.WorkWeekDays = T1.WkDys AND 
                                                        T4.WorkWeekHours = T1.Wk_hrs AND   
                                                        T4.WorkDayHours = T1.Hrs_Day
                                                        AND T4.IsActive = 'Y'
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_absence_dim T7 ON T3.EmployeeID = T7.EmployeeID AND 
                                                T1.Attendance_or_Absence_Type = T7.AbsenceType AND 
                                                T1.Start_Date = T7.AbsenceStartDate AND 
                                                T1.End_Date = T7.AbsenceEndDate
                                                AND T7.IsActive = 'Y'
WHERE
    (
        -- flags new data        
        ( CASE
            WHEN T3.EmployeeID = T7.EmployeeID AND 
                    T1.Attendance_or_Absence_Type = T7.AbsenceType AND 
                    T1.Start_Date = T7.AbsenceStartDate AND 
                    T1.End_Date = T7.AbsenceEndDate AND md5(concat(IFNULL(T3.EmployeeID,'.'), IFNULL(T1.Attendance_or_Absence_Type,'.'), IFNULL(T1.Start_Date,'.'), IFNULL(T1.End_Date,'.'))) <> T7.RowID    -- same employee, changed data
            THEN 'Y'
            WHEN T7.EmployeeID IS NULL -- new employee
            THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
        END  = 'Y' ) OR
        
        -- flags deleted data
        ( CASE
            WHEN T3.EmployeeID IS NULL
            THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
        END = 'Y' )
    )

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **absence_dim_new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View absence_dim_changed_rows is created

%%sql
-- Creating new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW absence_dim_changed_rows

    AS

SELECT 
    AbsenceID,
    EmployeeID,
    AbsenceType,
    SicknessGroup,
    AbsenceStartDate,
    AbsenceEndDate,
    Days,
    CalendarDays,
    WorkScheduleID,
    AnnualLeaveStart,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM absence_dim_new T5 WHERE HistoricIsActive = 'Y' or HistoricIsActive IS NULL

    UNION ALL

SELECT
    T4.AbsenceID,
    T4.EmployeeID,
    T4.AbsenceType,
    T4.SicknessGroup,
    T4.AbsenceStartDate,
    T4.AbsenceEndDate,
    T4.Days,
    T4.CalendarDays,
    T4.WorkScheduleID,
    T4.AnnualLeaveStart,
    T4.SourceSystemID,
    T4.IngestionDate,
    T4.ValidTo,
    T4.RowID,
    T4.IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.hr_absence_dim T4
INNER JOIN absence_dim_new T5 ON T4.EmployeeID = T5.EmployeeID AND T4.AbsenceType = T5.AbsenceType AND
 T4.AbsenceStartDate = T5.AbsenceStartDate AND T4.AbsenceEndDate = T5.AbsenceEndDate AND 
 T5.AbsenceID IS NULL AND T5.IsActive = 'Y'

# View absence_dim_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the Business Key (i.e. Staff_Number from vw_absences), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the business key, insert rows
## Table odw_harmonised.absence_dim is updated

%%sql
-- merge into fact table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.hr_absence_dim AS Target
USING absence_dim_changed_rows AS Source

ON Source.AbsenceID = Target.AbsenceID 

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = date_sub(current_timestamp,1),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows
WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT * ;

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised.absence_dim is updated

%%sql
-- Insert new WorkScheduleID

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.hr_absence_dim

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AbsenceID NULLS LAST) AS AbsenceID,
    EmployeeID,
    AbsenceType,
    SicknessGroup,
    AbsenceStartDate,
    AbsenceEndDate,
    Days,
    CalendarDays,
    WorkScheduleID,
    AnnualLeaveStart,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.hr_absence_dim;
